beer.beer_description: The long, cold nights of winter are a little brighter with Celebration Ale. Wonderfully robust and rich, Celebration Ale is dry-hopped for a lively, intense aroma. Brewed especially for the holidays, it is perfect for a festive gathering or for a quiet evening at home.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 255 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 52!

venue.venue_name: The Black Duck Cask and Bottle

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 5 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 2

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 10 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 3.

beer.beer_description: The long, cold nights of winter are a little brighter with Celebration Ale. Wonderfully robust and rich, Celebration Ale is dry-hopped for a lively, intense aroma. Brewed especially for the holidays, it is perfect for a festive gathering or for a quiet evening at home.

items.badge_description: Load up those hops, watch the IBU grow and drink it down! Now you’re all hopped up. The more bitter, the better. That's 85 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher. Try 5 more for Level 18!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 415 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 84!

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 80 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 17!

items.checkin_comment: I'm a dad now, Everton scored, and I'm on like barely any sleep.  Time to hit this case+ of bottles.  Celebrate

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 120 check-ins with a photo.
